channel.title: Ssh on home
channel.description: Recent content in Ssh on home

item.title: Menggunakan Ssh
item.description: Cara mengecek key rsa yang sudah di ada $ ls -al ~/.ssh Cara membuat ssh Keys dengan ssh $ ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -C "xperia.tipobrata@gmail.com" Generating public/private rsa key pair. Enter file in which to save the key (/home/nagamaska/.ssh/id_rsa): Enter passphrase (empty for no passphrase): Enter same passphrase again: Your identification has been saved in /home/nagamaska/.ssh/id_rsa. Your public key has been saved in /home/nagamaska/.ssh/id_rsa.pub. The key fingerprint is: 31:1e:74:a3:dc:17:cd:5a:a9:5d:4c:28:c1:a9:28:c8 xperia.
